de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag

Class BaseTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.BaseTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BaseTag>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ISO15693Tag

    public class BaseTag
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BaseTag>
    Class implements an easy access to basic RFID tags. Communication is based on the Feig IscTagHandler API or traditionally on the FedmTableItem (ISO/BRM) implemented in the Feig API. The class supports ISO tags and BRM tags. ISO tags are produced when using a reader in host mode, BRM tags when using a reader in the buffered reader mode. Instances of this class and sub-classes implicitly support XML serializing by JAXB.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public BaseTag(de.feig.TagHandler.FedmIscTagHandler handler)
        throws de.feig.FedmException,
               de.feig.FePortDriverException,
               de.feig.FeReaderDriverException
        Initialize a new BaseTag with the supplied tag handler.
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler of the tag
        Throws:
        de.feig.FedmException - if the Feig handler throws an exception
        de.feig.FePortDriverException - if the communication with the RFID device port failed
        de.feig.FeReaderDriverException - if the communication with the RFID device driver failed

      • getRSSI

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getRSSI()
        Returns the RSSI (signal strength indicator) for this tag from all antennas. The returned map contains the measured RSSI indexed by each available antenna.
        Returns:
        the RSSI from all antennas or null if no RSSI is available

      • getRSSI

        public int getRSSI(int antenna)
        Returns the RSSI (signal strength indicator) for this tag from a specific antenna.
        Parameters:
        antenna - the antenna index
        Returns:
        the measured RSSI or a negative value if no RSSI is available

      • getMaxRSSI

        public int getMaxRSSI()
